name: Once Upon a Dream (kassiaraj)
description:
Game created by Kassia Raj

Journey through a child's dreamscape as they try to go to sleep. Taking on the form of an astronaut, count sheep to help the child get a good night's rest. Progress through this five-level game, platforming in space and dodging monsters. 

STORY:

It's bedtime, but you just can't fall asleep. You have a big day ahead tomorrow. Your class is visiting the Houston Space Center and you couldn't be more excited. Yet, no matter how much you want to give in to the sweet release of sleep, you can't do it. You squeeze your eyes shut, but nothing. As you drift, you think of your future. Maybe you'll be an astronaut when you're older, just like you always wanted. What was that trick Mom always taught you? Whenever you can't sleep, count sheep.Okay... 1... 2... 3... 4...

CREDITS:

Game Mechanics code created by Michael Baker.

Once Upon a Dream Lullaby by A.Krishna on YouTube.com

All art assets found in the Unity Asset Store:

"Stylized Astronaut" by PulsarBytes

"3LE LowPoly Cloud Pack" by 3LE Studios

"Sheep Toy Models" by Psionic Games

"Free Steel Ladder Pack" by Surpent
